Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1970...
Injured on 7/31/1975 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/10/1978, off Tom Hall (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/11/1978, off Dan Schatzeder (SF)...
Injured on 7/23/1980 with a Broken Elbow, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 8/8/1981 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/20/1984 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/1/1985 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1985...
Injured on 4/11/1986 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/21/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $1,150,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/11/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $510,000 per year...
